title: Interval<Iso8601_date_time>
$comments: Defined in Foundation_types IM, inherits from Interval

lower_included.description: `lower` boundary value included in range if not `lower_unbounded`.

upper_included.description: `upper` boundary value included in range if not `upper_unbounded`.

has.description: True if `(lower_unbounded or lower_included and v >= lower) or v > lower and (upper_unbounded or upper_included and v <= upper or v < upper)`.

intersects.description: True if there is any overlap between intervals represented by Current and `other'. True if at least one limit of other is strictly inside the limits of this interval.

contains.description: True if current interval properly contains `other`? True if all points of `other` are inside the current interval.

is_equal.description: True if current object's interval is semantically same as `other`.

$invariants.Limits_consistent: (not upper_unbounded and not lower_unbounded) implies lower <= upper
$invariants.Limits_comparable: (not upper_unbounded and not lower_unbounded) implies lower.strictly_comparable_to (upper)
